category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
COMPASSIONATE LORD,

Your mercy has brought me to the start of a new day.
This day will be a waste unless I grow in Your grace,
learn more about You,
and become more mature in my faith.

Help me today to know You for who You really are,
to love You more than anything,
to serve You completely,
and to be in total awe of You.

By Your grace, let my will line up with Yours.
I know the power to obey isn't in me, but that Your free love is the only thing that makes me able to serve You.

Here is my empty heart;
please overflow it with Your best gifts.
Here is my clouded understanding;
please clear away the fog of my ignorance.

O ever-watchful Shepherd,
lead, guide, and take care of me today.
Without Your guidance and protection, I'll mess up and wander off.
Put boundaries around my path so I don't wander into unhealthy pleasures
and get caught up in their poison.
Guide my steps so I don't get tangled up in the enemy's secret snares
or fall into his hidden traps.

Protect me from my enemies,
from bad situations,
and from myself.

My biggest struggles are a part of my own nature;
They cling to me like my own skin;
I can't escape them.
From morning to night, they are stuck to me.
They're always tempting me.
My enemy is inside my own heart.

Come with Your almighty power and throw him out, destroy him,
and wipe out every last bit of my sinful nature in me today.
